statements: CREATE TABLE sustainability_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(100), temperature FLOAT, humidity FLOAT, carbon_dioxide_level FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (id INT PRIMARY KEY, category VARCHAR(50), description TEXT, impact_score INT);
CREATE TABLE sustainability_actions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, action_name VARCHAR(50), description TEXT, impact_reduction INT);
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (id INT PRIMARY KEY, category TEXT, description TEXT, carbon_footprint DECIMAL, energy_consumption DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE sustainability_goals (id INT PRIMARY KEY, goal TEXT, target TEXT, progress DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE sustainability_actions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, action TEXT, impact TEXT, effectiveness DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE carbon_footprint (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, company_name STRING, emission_level FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, device_id UUID, consumption FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE waste_management (id UUID PRIMARY KEY, company_name STRING, waste_type STRING, weight FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, description TEXT, impact_type TEXT)
CREATE TABLE sustainability_goals (id INT PRIMARY KEY, goal_name TEXT, target TEXT, completion_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE sustainability_initiatives (id INT PRIMARY KEY, initiative_name TEXT, description TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
